articles.description: The sale of low-dose cannabidiol preparations over the counter at Australian pharmacies has been allowed since early this year. But you won't find any at your local chemist and there is a reason for that
articles.content: Since early 2021, the Therapeutic Goods Administration (TGA) has allowed the sale of low-dose cannabidiol (CBD) preparations over the counter at Australian pharmacies. But you won't find any at your … [+6903 chars]
